scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:PreviewTheme_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
## if publishing is already in-progress, then show the indicator #set ($scheduledCommitProgressKey = "publish-ui:${core_v2_user.Accessing.Id}") #set ($status = $core_v2_widget.GetScheduledFileStatus($scheduledCommitProgressKey)) #set ($scheduledCommitInProgress = false)
#if ($status && $status.PercentComplete < 1) #set ($scheduledCommitInProgress = true) $core_v2_ui.ScheduledFile($scheduledCommitProgressKey, "%{ IncludeProgress = 'True', IncludeAllMessages = 'False', IncludeLatestMessage = 'True' }") #end
$core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('list.vm') #registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.previewTheme') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end
